paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: breast cancer in family (mother, sister, niece)
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One individual with the 9610C>T mutation had three cases of breast cancer in her family: in her mother, sister and niece.

functional_data.summary: Mutation likely contributes to breast cancer risk.

variants.additional_notes: Considered relevant according to the BIC database.
key_quotes: One individual with the 9610C>T mutation had three cases of breast cancer in her family: in her mother, sister and niece.

individual_records.phenotype_details: breast cancer in family (sister, aunt, brother, uncle)
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One c.6631delTTAAATG mutation carrier had a sister with breast cancer, her aunt had ovarian cancer, and in addition, her brother had prostate cancer and her uncle had gastric cancer.

functional_data.summary: Mutation likely contributes to breast cancer risk.

variants.additional_notes: Considered a novel mutation according to the BIC database.
key_quotes: One c.6631delTTAAATG mutation carrier had a sister with breast cancer, her aunt had ovarian cancer, and in addition, her brother had prostate cancer and her uncle had gastric cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
